---
title: "HDI impact on suicides"
autor: "Fernando Gomes"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
master <- read_csv("../data/master.csv")
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(openintro)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
master %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = `HDI for year`)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.005) +
  labs(title = "Suicides by HDI",
       x = "HDI",
       y = "Suicides count") +
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(y = "Suicides count"), method = "lm", color = "Red")
  
``` 
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(y = `suicides_no`), method = "lm", color = "Red") 
```
